HOME.INTRO_COPY: Show your love for MarcAngelo’s healthy, delicious and easy-to-prepare meats by posting @MarcAngelo on Twitter, Facebook or Instagram with the hashtag #DriveHomeDelicious for a chance to win a FIAT 500!

ENTER.COPY:
Where there’s a grill, there’s a way!

Get creative and share your MarcAngelo moments on social media for a chance to drive home a FIAT 500! We want to see the delicious meals you cook up, the unique moments around the grill, and all the fun times with family and friends.

HOW TO ENTER

Entering the contest is easy! Simply fill out your information and connect your social accounts below. Then, share your MarcAngelo experiences with @MarcAngelo on Twitter, Facebook or Instagram using the hashtag #DriveHomeDelicious.

INCREASE YOUR CHANCES

You’ll earn one ballot for the grand prize draw simply by submitting your information below. Earn an additional three ballots for posting @MarcAngelo with the hashtag #DriveHomeDelicious. Then, to really increase your odds, keep posting each month using our monthly hashtags and earn an additional ten ballots each month!

  • Enter the Contest ​​= ​1 Ballot
  • Use #DriveHomeDelicious ​= ​3 Ballots
  • Use a Monthly Hashtag​= ​10 Ballots

THE GRAND PRIZE

The winner of the grand prize, a FIAT 500, will be chosen via a random draw. However, you can increase your odds by collecting more and more ballots, so keep posting!
ENTER.TITLE: Enter the contest
ENTER.OPT_IN: I would like to receive future correspondence from MarcAngelo such as newsletters, promotions, coupons, recipies, and updates.
ENTER.RULES: I have read and agree to the Rules & Regulations.

HOWTOPLAY.TITLE: How to Play
HOWTOPLAY.COPY:
Enter/Login

Complete the entry form to setup your game account.

Remember your login for next time.

Controls

Use the left & right arrow keys to allow your character to jump from platform to platform. Watch out for spikes!

Controls

Tilt your device left and right to allow your character to jump from platform to platform. Watch out for spikes!

Collect Prizes

Catch the $1 coins to receive a $1 off MarcAngelo product coupon in the mail.

Power Ups

Grab burgers, sausages, and kabobs to boost your speed.

Win

To win the game, take Marc or Angelo through all 5 levels.

Questions?

Having trouble? Check out the

FAQ

Play the Game
